Room.Name: Rum Road/Long Dock Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rum Road and the Long Dock.
Room.LongDescription: At the southern end of Rum Road you see the island's famous dwarven distillery where the finest and strongest rum is made. Both sides of the road have an equal number of garish pubs and saloons, and a great deal of noise is coming from them all. Standing by itself at the north end of the road is a bright red house. Quite a few women of all races are hanging out the windows and lolling on the veranda. They don't seem to be wearing much in the way of clothes, and they seem to know a lot of the sailors and pirates walking nearby.
